# SEQ08 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 8 focuses on housing

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl035, apl036, apl037, apl038, apl039, apl040

## Emergent Phenomena
Diverse housing that accommodates different household types and life stages

## Overview
This sequence contains 6 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
